description: This is the fleece you grab as you head out to work, the farmer’s market, or on a quick trek around town. Warm and soft, the Alpenex™ Light double knit delivers thermal performance with the look and texture of wool so you can wear it as sweater inside, then as a warming layer under a shell outside. The trim fit and clean design create a streamlined, contemporary aesthetic. Articulated patterning adds freedom of movement.
name: Arcteryx Covert LT Pullover - Mens
